data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: People are capable at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of.

data.author: Paulo Coeho
data.quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.

data.author: Ayrton Senna
data.quote: Fear is exciting for me.

data.author: Ayrton Senna
data.quote: On a given day, a given circumstance, you think you have a limit. And you then go for this limit and you touch this limit, and you think, 'Okay, this is the limit'. And so you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.

data.author: Anderson Silva
data.quote: You can't give up on your dreams.

data.author: Pele
data.quote: Everything is practice

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: Don't forget, beautiful sunsets need cloudy skies

data.author: The Jackal (Far Cry 2)
data.quote: You can't break a man the way you do a dog or a horse. The harder you beat a man, the taller he stands.

data.author: G Man (Half-Life 2)
data.quote: The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.

data.author: Ada Wong (Resident Evil 6)
data.quote: The more things change, the more they stay the same.

data.author: Sheik (The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time)
data.quote: Time passes, people move. Like a river's flow, it never ends. A childish mind will turn to noble ambition

data.author: Ezio (Assasin's Creed II)
data.quote: Don't ever stop. Always keep going, no matter what happens and is taken from you. Even when life is so unfair, don't give up.

data.author: Samus Aran (Metroid: Other M)
data.quote: My past is not a memory. It's a force at my back. It pushes and steers. I may not always like where it leads me, but like any story, the past needs resolution. What's past is prologue.

data.author: Pandora (God of War III)
data.quote: Hope is what makes us strong. It is why we are here. It's what we fight with when all else is lost.

data.author: Waka (Okami)
data.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. So just take it step by step.

data.author: Ryu (Street Fighter Alpha 3)
data.quote: True victory is to give all of yourself, without regret.

data.author: Edmund Burke
data.quote: You must always remember that the only thing necessary for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing.

data.author: Peppy Hare (Lylat Wars/Star Fox 64)
data.quote: Never give up. Trust your instincts.

data.author: Victor Sullivan (Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception)
data.quote: We don't get to choose how we start in this life. Real 'greatness' is what you do with the hand you're dealt.

data.author: Ignitus (The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon)
data.quote: Even in the darkest of times, there is always hope. But sometimes fear clouds our vision. Sometimes our strength gives out. And yet sometimes, when all seems lost, a light shines through the darkness, and we are reminded that even the smallest amount of courage can turn the tides of war.
